section.heading: Single custodianship.
section.text: A transfer shall be made only for 1 minor, and only 1 person may be the custodian. All custodial property held under this chapter by the same custodian for the benefit of the same minor constitutes a single custodianship.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 10 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act.
